name: Schrodinger's Cats
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2022

Manage Schrodinger's experiment while keeping his cats

happy as they get progressively needier! How long can you last?

Observe Schrodinger's box on the monitor and wait for the beeping sound indicating the Cat Detector is lowering. Take note of whether the Cat Detector indicates the cat is alive or dead and hit the corresponding button, but keep an eye on the cats in the room with you, they'll meow when they want your attention. You'll have less time to hit the right button the longer you last, so don't get distracted!

The left cat wants pets, but don't touch its belly or you'll lose your hand!

The cat by the door wants it open, yet never seems to leave.

Take too long to make either cat happy and they'll block your view of the box, forcing you to guess the right button!

Fullscreen recommended.

If you can't look around in the browser version, wait until the retry button appears.

Controls: Click to interact
